document_data.name: Vilhon Mercenary Corps
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vilhon Mercenary Corps''' were a renowned group that traveled around the ''Forgotten Realms'' completing various contracts for noble lords and city-states.{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|52}}
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], it was rumored [[Caleb Randol|Lord Caleb Randol]] of [[Kovel Mansion]] commissioned the group to undermine [[Black Fist]] operations north of [[Phlan]].
